headline: Why Analysts See Newmont’s Story Shifting as Bullish Momentum Builds
summary: Newmont's stock narrative is evolving as several analysts have modestly raised their price targets for the company, with the fair value estimate moving from $100.97 to $103.42 per share. This change comes amid a mix of optimism about rising gold prices and prudent company management. However, some voices remain cautious due to concerns about sector volatility. Stay tuned to see how you can track ongoing shifts in sentiment and keep informed about Newmont's changing outlook. Analyst Price...
